title: Baseball Moguls
description:
Chris explains his nighttime ritual that involves drinking and a baseball simulator (01:50:00). Michael Montante joins the program to discuss his problem with Kirk's pro-choice position following his reporting on the Markelle Taylor story in the New York Times (00:11:30 & 00:29:30). Matt Siegel is a legend in Boston radio and is only allowed a 3 minute recorded retirement message (00:18:00). Red13, the original studio home of KMS, has an employee bad-mouthing Kirk and an apology by the owner does not appear to be enough (00:41:25). Ryen Russillo makes some snarky remarks toward Dennis & Callahan on The Bill Simmons Show, calls & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
